reviewText:
They break it down so you can easily learn different parts.  They make it clear how people change the songs around to sing harmony depending on who is singing lead.  If you want to learn how to sing harmony in bluegrass, this is a great way to deepen your understanding and ability to do it.  I bought copies for all the women in my band and we are going to work our way through the songs developing three-part harmony on each one.  Maybe even four!  I found out about this dvd this summer at NashCamp, a bluegrass jam camp in Nashville, where Bill Evans was one of the outstanding teachers.  He's the BEST!
Susan Martin
